ema bi warthawe wadidura thorathuru anuwa 2019.05.24 dina paya 22ta kurunagala polis sthanaya wisin waidya shafi athadanguwata gena athi bawath ema awasthawa wana wita ohuta erehiwa thawhid jamad sanwidhanayata ladiwa katayuthu kirima pilibandawath sinhala kanthawan daru prasuthiyedi nawatha gab ganim sidunowana aakarayata katayuthu karana bawatath ohu siseriyan sathkam 8000kata aasanna pramanayak sidukara athi bawatath chodana naga thibe. 2019.05.26 dina kurunagala kottasa bhara polis adhikariwaraya aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwe adhyakshawaraya wetha pitu ataka warthawak yomukaramin waidya safita erehiwa siseriyan sathkam sidukirimedi nosalakilimath kamin kanthawakage muthra nalawalata hani sidukirima, muslim kanthawanta elaarti sathkam sidukirimata niyamithawa thibunada ese nokara eewa kala bawata asathya satahan yedima, sinhala kanthawange siseriyan sathkam kirimedi kuda kapumak yoda aswabhawika ayurin hasirena bawa muslim kanthawange thunwana siseriyan sathkama kirimedi elaarti sathkam sidukirimata niyamithawa thibunada ese nokara eewa kala bawata athsan yedimath, sinhala kanthawangen balen elaarti sathkam sandaha kamaththa ganima, siseriyan sathkamwaladi itha aswabhawika ayurin sakasahitha lesa kapumata atha dama hasirena bawath, ee sambandhayen an niladharin ha mithuranta pawasu wita eya aaranchi wi waidya shafi wisin waidyawarayakuta kala nohakkak nomathi bawata tharjanaya kirimath, 2017 siseriyan sathkamen pasu nawatha daru upathak nowu bawata ha 2011, 2010, 2019 siseriyan sathkam kala thidenaku daruwan nolada bawa aahara gena sitiyadi siseriyan sathkamak balen sidu kala bawa ee sakshi 10 we. 2019.05.24 dina waidya shafi athadanguwata ganima sandaha ohuta erehiwa naga athi chodana wanne thrasthawadi kandayamaka mudal labagena ema kandayame aramuna itukirima ha ema mudalwalin depala miladi ganimata katayuthu kirima, pradeshaye athiwi athi unusumkari thaththwaya matha mema pudgalaya saha anekuth parshwa athara muslim sinhala jathin athara athiwiya haki gatumak walakwa ganima ha mema pudgalaya pala gos sangawi sitimata ida athi bawa yannaya.
